name: Give Die Repeat
description:
Traverse the moon avoiding Blobbies and Space Zombies as you try to give the gift you found to their rightful owner. Be careful though! If you die you drop the gift and it flies off somewhere else in the level.

Controls

Move using  W, A, D / Arrow Keys.

Interact with people and objects using E or Enter.

If something goes wrong, press R and try again.
